name: Darkness Personified
description:
You are trapped inside your apartment with items that remind you of your past. Some items are good, and some items are bad. It is your job to make it through the day without remembering your traumatic history…and to avoid the demons your memories may bring with them.

Objective:

Interact with objects and find your key. Be careful, some objects will cause paranormal results.

Controls

  • Walk: use (W,A,S,D)
  • Run: Hold Left Shift
  • Interact: Press E
  • Look Around: Use mouse

Credits:

  • Programming - Ryuu365
  • 3D Graphics - cupcakekittty/Lauren Deas
  • 3D Graphics - rip_jules_
  • Game Sound - Eliphant
